name: THE POWER OF METAL
description:
In Metalland the great hero is the one who hears the call of Metal, can you hear the call?

This is a classic pixel art rpg, the battles are tactical and challenging in each map explored.

*The MAC version only exists in Portuguese BR

This game is just a sample of my work, I intend with it to raise funds for a great classic rpg project, you can help me, through a collective funding; https://www.patreon.com/ThePowerofMetal
